description: This file provides platform-dependent utility functions for an HTTP Simple Proxy object, specifically the creation function 'HttpCreateSimpleProxy'. It includes licensing information, module descriptions, and a single function implementation that calls 'HttpSpoCreate' to instantiate the proxy object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpCreateSimpleProxy(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new HTTP Simple Proxy object by invoking 'HttpSpoCreate' with the provided contexts.
